channel.title: 704 source decreasing amount of players to start cw
channel.description: Can someone tell me which file i go to in order to decrease the amount of players needed to start a game of castle wars

item.title: 704 source decreasing amount of players to start cw
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Might be a bit late, but maybe you’ll read this:

src > com > rs > game > minigames > CastleWars.java

search for

change the ‘5’ (for me it’s a 5 at least) to any wanted number of players to start a game

Read full topic
